abstract: Belgian police arrest two people suspected of planning terrorist attack in Brussels around New Year's Eve.
lead_paragraph: In a series of raids, the authorities found Islamic State propaganda and military-style hardware and computer equipment in the homes of the two suspects.

headline.main: Belgium Arrests 2 Linked to New Year’s Eve Plot to Attack Brussels
headline.print_headline: Dec. 31 Plot Brings Raids and Arrests in Belgium

snippet: In a series of raids, the authorities found Islamic State propaganda and military-style hardware and computer equipment in the homes of the two suspects.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
